description: After working out Jacob Woods and Musclebear Montreal talk about what part of the body they trained. Musclebear offers to give Jacob a little massage to tend to his sore muscles. While massaging his shoulders, Musclebear makes his way past his shoulders and massages the rest of his body, slowly rubbing his chest and thighs. They hear a sudden storm and decide to stay in the locker room and enjoy some time together.
title: Muscled Furry Studs
